about_the_game:
InoLab Trials is a multiplayer game where players become part of a grand experiment, competing in a series of increasingly difficult trials designed to push their skills, teamwork, and problem-solving abilities to the limit. You and your team are volunteers for InoLab facility, a mysterious organization running cutting-edge tests on human potential, using high-pressure scenarios that range from physical challenges to complex puzzles.

Will you rise to the top and outsmart the competition, or will the trials prove too difficult? With a mix of competitive and cooperative gameplay, you’ll either stand as a champion or fall as a failure in the eyes of InoLab.

Important Note:

InoLab Trials is an indie game currently in early access and the early stages of development. I’m a solo developer working hard to bring this experience to life. By purchasing, playing, and providing feedback, you're directly supporting the continued development of the game. Your reviews and insights mean a lot to me and will help shape the future of InoLab Trials. Thank you for being part of this journey.

Key Features:

  • Multiple Trials and Challenges: Test your abilities in a variety of trials, each requiring a unique combination of skill, reflexes, and teamwork. Whether you prefer solo runs or cooperative gameplay with friends, every challenge provides a new opportunity to prove yourself.

  • Single and Multiplayer Modes: Play solo or with friends, teaming up to overcome the trials together. Compete in leaderboard-driven challenges, or work together to solve intricate puzzles and escape impossible situations.

  • Leaderboards and Competitions: Each trial features a global leaderboard, pushing you to compete for the best times and highest scores. Whether you’re climbing platforms or escaping a maze, only the top performers will reach the top.

  • Customizable Player and Base: Each team has its own base where you can hang out, check the leaderboards, and customize your personal room and character. No matter which team you join, your customizations stay with you.

Trials (Current and Upcoming):

  • Maze Shift (Available Now) (40%):
    Generate a new square maze by choosing its size, then navigate through it solo or with your team. Each maze offers a unique challenge. Future updates will bring checkpoints, abilities, and new gameplay modes like racing your friends or setting team records!

  • Rise Up (Available Now) (20%):
    A vertical platformer where teamwork is key. Start at the base and ascend through levels filled with challenging obstacles. Future updates will introduce unique player abilities, cooperative mechanics, and new environmental challenges that require strategy and coordination.

  • Breakout (In Development):
    Work together to solve intricate puzzles and escape various themed rooms before time runs out. Each scene will have its own story, puzzles, and escape routes, making every playthrough a new experience. More rooms and puzzle mechanics will be added in upcoming updates!

InoLab Trials offers a perfect blend of fun and challenge, whether you're looking to test your own limits or team up with friends. With more trials coming soon, the experiments have only just begun!

name: InoLab Trials

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64
  • Processor: 4 Core 8 Thread - 3GH
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: no
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11 64
  • Processor: 6 Core 12 Thread- 3GH
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 3060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: no

short_description: InoLab Trials is a multiplayer game where players compete in a series of skill-based trials, either solo or with friends. Customize your character, tackle challenges, and climb the leaderboards.
